data.text: @PCSoblahdeehell @ajmpolite His only interest is getting the top job. Once he has got it - and I fear that he will - he will have no idea how to do it.

@jwripple @ajmpolite We'll see.

Effective in creating discord, mischief, venom, bile, wrecking every project he goes near - but as yet limited success in grabbing the top job ... let alone doing anything positive, useful, helpful, or indeed much at all for the country whose name he takes in vain. https://t.co/E3kCMWHbBD

@ajmpolite @guse_guse He is motivating the knuckledraggers, Bannon advising him possibly ? He is also following advice from his press bosses. Alexander Boris de Pfeffel Johnson is a dangerous, self serving ,treacherous bully. We must be careful.
@ajmpolite The white flag crap grrrrrr! The man is a buffoon who would turn tail and run for the hills if he ever found himself in a war, yet he continues to use these idiotic war analogies.

@ajmpolite They lets snatch our own victory from the jaws of defeat and Remain, that will teach those pesky Europeans not to mess with us and that Leave does not mean Leave and we've had a vote but got over it and had another!!
